thread.section_title: NameTagCountry.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NameTagCountry.com | nametagcountry.com
thread.title: Jonathan W.

author: Jonathan W.
title: Jonathan W.
text: I've used NameTagCountry for several years now, ordering approximately 4-5 tags per year. The online ordering platform is fantastic, with a plethora of layouts available and great preview tool. With the last order I placed, a proof was sent within an hour of the order and shipped the day after it was approved for production. I've never had a bad experience, and greatly enjoy doing business with this company.
